subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Careers and Professions
lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish of Britain won Stage 15 on a windy day that reminded him of home, and Thomas Voeckler of France retained the yellow jersey.
snippet: Mark Cavendish of Britain won Stage 15 on a windy day that reminded him of home, and Thomas Voeckler of France retained the yellow jersey.
